IsCameraView.description: Whether the positioning of this object is used as camera position(?)

EnableLimitAngle.description: Whether to enable/disable the Azimuth/Elevation angle limits.

AzimuthLimitAngle.description: Angle limit for turning, includes azimuth. To understand what it means google azimuth, it is hard to explain.

ElevationLimitAngle.description: Angle limit for the camera's elevation.

GravityOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position in the direction of the player's gravity?

PlayerOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position from the player's position.

WorldOffset.description: How much to offset this camera's position from its position in the world.

PositionMode.description: How the camera should be positioned.

Distance.description: The distance this camera stays away from the player.

Extra.value: A camera which can be used for panning effects(?)
